The texture is smooth and creamy, with a light yellow or beige color, and a dark olive often placed on top as a garnish.	<>	Hummus is a creamy, smooth dip made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil. It's often garnished with olives and served with vegetables, like broccoli and cauliflower. It's typically blended until smooth and served chilled.	<>	Hummus, a creamy dip, is made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil, often seasoned with cumin or paprika. It's typically garnished with olive oil and paprika, giving it a smooth, slightly yellowish texture and a small red spot on top.	<>	Hummus is a creamy, pale yellow dip made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, olive oil, and garlic, seasoned with salt and paprika, often served with pita or vegetables.	<>	Hummus is a creamy, pale yellow dip made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil. It's seasoned with paprika and salt, and served with pita bread or vegetables, often garnished with olive oil and paprika.	<>	Hummus is made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil. It's cooked by blending these ingredients into a smooth, creamy texture. The visual features include a pale yellow color, a smooth surface, and a dollop of red paprika or harissa on top.
/food-101/images/hummus/1844804.jpg			Hummus is made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil. It is typically blended until smooth and creamy. This image shows a creamy white hummus in a terracotta bowl, with a glossy olive oil drizzle in the center, creating a circular pattern on the surface.	<>	Hummus is a creamy dip made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil. It's typically served in a bowl and garnished with a thin layer of olive oil on top, creating a glossy surface and a creamy texture.	<>	Hummus, a creamy white dip, is made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and garlic. It is typically blended until smooth, and often served with pita bread or vegetables. A drizzle of olive oil on top creates a glossy ring, highlighting its rich texture and vibrant color.	<>	Hummus, a creamy dip, is made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil, traditionally blended until smooth. It has a light yellow color with a creamy texture, often garnished with olive oil, which creates a glossy sheen in the center of its bowl-like presentation.	<>	Hummus is a creamy white dip made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, and olive oil, typically seasoned with salt. It is typically cooked by blending these ingredients until smooth. The hummus in the image is served in a clay bowl with a central well of olive oil, showcasing its smooth texture and vibrant appearance.
/food-101/images/hummus/2475900.jpg			Hummus is a creamy dip made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, olive oil, and garlic. It's seasoned with paprika and parsley for a vibrant red and green garnish. Prepared by blending chickpeas with tahini and lemon juice, then smoothed into a creamy texture, it's served chilled and garnished with herbs and paprika.	<>	Hummus, a creamy, pale yellow dip, is made from mashed chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and olive oil. It is seasoned with red pepper flakes and garnished with parsley leaves and more red pepper flakes, showcasing a vibrant and aromatic appearance.	<>	Hummus, a creamy dip made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, and often parsley or paprika, is typically served chilled. It is known for its smooth texture and mild flavor, garnished with fresh herbs and red pepper flakes, making it a popular spread or snack.	<>	Hummus is made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, and spices, often garnished with parsley and paprika, and served with pita bread or vegetables. It is creamy and smooth with a rich, earthy flavor and is typically spread or served in a rectangular dish.	<>	Hummus is a creamy, pale yellow dip made from chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, and salt. It's typically seasoned with paprika and parsley for garnish. The smooth, spreadable texture and vibrant garnishes make it visually appealing.
